lead_paragraph: BOROWITZ--Rabbi Eugene. The Jewish community lost one of its great spokesmen. Our deepest sympathies to his three daughters, especially Lisa, a loyal friend for twenty plus years. Bonnie and Tom Strauss 1/3
snippet: BOROWITZ--Rabbi Eugene. The Jewish community lost one of its great spokesmen. Our deepest sympathies to his three daughters, especially Lisa, a loyal friend for twenty plus years. Bonnie and Tom Strauss 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BOROWITZ, RABBI EUGENE
